data.message: Has there been 'dodgy' batches of coca cola zero sugar because I'm fed up buying coke zero and it tastes so weird/funny/not right and is quite flat!?! This has been from cans and bottles. I've always loved coke zero but I don't ever remember having this problem until the past year. I shouldn't have to open a can/bottle and say "yes, this is a nice one! 🙆"

replies.message: Hi, could you please give us a call on 0800 22 77 11 (option 2), so we can look into this for you. Thanks
